summary: The Organic Dairy Assistance, Investment, and Reporting Yields Act of 2025 (O DAIRY Act) aims to support organic dairy producers and processors. It extends emergency assistance for organic dairy farmers, streamlines payments, and mandates improved data collection for organic milk production costs and prices. The bill also requires the Secretary of Agriculture to propose and implement safety net programs for organic dairy farms and establish a program for investments in organic dairy processing infrastructure, including regional market specialists. Appropriations are authorized for these initiatives.
